src_original: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /  rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya pañcāmātyaśatānyabhūvan /
sapta putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ sudarśanānāṃ mahātejasāṃ mahābalānām /
tena ca samayena lokadhātāvantarakalpakṣaye pratyupasthite pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu loke

prādurbhūteṣu daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣvantarhiteṣu daśākuśalakarmapathavartinaḥ  sattvā yadbhūyasā durgatigāmino 'bhūvan /  te daśākuśalakarmapathasamādānahetoḥ parīttāyuṣo 'bhūvan alpabhogā virūpā vivarṇā
